product_name: REI Merino Wool Side Stripe Socks - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The REI Merino Wool Side Stripe socks help regulate heat and moisture with the natural performance of merino wool. Merino wool on inner face provides excellent temperature regulation in any climate while wicking moisture and deterring odors. Stretch nylon on outer face provides durability; spandex yarns boost comfort and improve fit. Heels and toes are reinforced for longevity; arch support bands and chafe-free seamless toes enhance comfort. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The REI Merino Wool Side Stripe socks help regulate heat and moisture with the natural performance of merino wool.
